endpoints.description: Retrieve the list of sustainability certifications associated with forest products.
Add a new forest product for monitoring and certification purposes.
Retrieve details of a specific forest product based on its identifier.
Update information associated with a specific forest product.
Remove a forest product from the monitoring service.
Retrieve the movement logs of forest products across the supply chain.
Record a new movement of a forest product within the supply chain.
Generate and retrieve analytical reports on product movements and certifications.
List all locations involved in the supply chain process.
Set up alerts and notifications for specific conditions such as movement anomalies.
